Item ID2128

Equa leaves are ingredients utilised in gnome cooking that heal 1 hitpoint each. They are used in almost all gnome food, and have little other use, besides possibly in the Big Chompy Bird Hunting quest.

They can be purchased at the two food stores on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Grand Tree in the Tree Gnome Stronghold. Several respawn points are located in the south-east of Feldip Hills.

'''Equa leaves''' are ingredients utilised in [[gnome cooking]] that heal 1 [[hitpoint]] each. They are used in almost all gnome [[food]], and have little other use, besides possibly in the [[Big Chompy Bird Hunting]] [[Quests|quest]].

They can be purchased at the two food stores on the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} of the [[Grand Tree]] in the [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]]. Several [[Spawning|respawn]] points are located in the south-east of [[Feldip Hills]].
